summary: After her businessman husband dies suspiciously in a Mexican plane crash, his widow begins to investigate his labyrinthine financial dealings, not all of which are legal.
cast: Andie MacDowell|Liam Neeson|Viggo Mortensen|Jack Thompson|Paul Spencer|Chad Power|Monica Mikala|Kaelynn Craddick|Sara Craddick|Luis Cortés|Amy Van Nostrand|Pedro Gonzalez Gonzalez|Lucy Rodriguez|Jeff Corey|Miriam Reed|Kimberley LaMarque|Francine Lee|Alberto Estrella|Jorge Fegán|Paco Mauri|Sylvia Short|Sage Allen|Montrose Hagins|Loló Navarro|Rodrigo Puebla|Juan Antonio Llanes|Günter Meisner|Thomas Frey|Monica Simon|Natasa Manisali|Nikos Kouros|Lydia Lenosi|Mandana Marino|Hosni Hasham Zahram|Salh Abu El Asem|Maisa El Rafai|Negm El Deen Mohammed Afifi|Robin Lee|Hannaa Hamed Ibrahim|Hark Bohm|Dieter Dost|Andreas Marianos|Aristidis Nikoloudis|Yolanda Romersa|Rob Sargeant
title: Ruby Cairo
